# currencyCode

**Instance Property**

The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to the monetary amount.

## Declaration

```swift
var currencyCode: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this value to determine the appropriate currency designator to apply to the value in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCurrencyAmount/amount] property. To retrieve the list of available currency codes, call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/isoCurrencyCodes] method of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale] class.

## Getting the Currency Information

- **amount**: The monetary amount associated with the currency.
